Package moteur.strategy

Interface Strategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    faceUpTheBigger, faceUpTheFirst, randomTake, takeTheBest, takeTheBestEnfer
    public interface Strategy
    This interface Strategy uses the Design Pattern, which enables selecting a specific algorithm or methode to excute at a run time. Instead of implementing a single algorithm directly, code receives run-time instructions as to which in a family of algorithms to use.

    Description from Wiki : (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strategy_pattern) " Strategy lets the algorithm vary independently from clients that use it. Strategy is one of the patterns ... that popularized the concept of using design patterns to describe how to design flexible and reusable object-oriented software. "

    Here in the interface Strategy there is a methode named takeOffer(Player playerOwn) and makeOffer(Player playerOwn), we use it to make decisions like which card to turn to Face_Up, or when its the virtual player's turn to choose an offer, which to pick ?

    Thanks to the Strategy Pattern, we can add more algorithm in the future.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Ask the player to make an offer.
      void takeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
